鸐鸐鸐

鸐字的基本解释

鸐
dí
〔鸐雉（
zh?）〕山雉，野鸡。

鸐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》直角切，入覺，澄。］
［《集韻》亭歷切，入鍚，端。］
(1)长尾野鸡。
(2)即子规。

鸐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸐； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1503第32
【集韻】亭歷切，音笛。【爾雅·釋鳥】鸐，山雉。【郭註】長尾者。【疏】山雉，一名鸐。今俗呼山雞。李時珍曰：雉居原野，鸐居山林，故得山名，大者爲鷮。又【王子年·拾遺記】帝堯在位，羽山北有善鳴之鳥，人面鳥喙，八翼一足，毛色如雉，行不踐地，名曰靑鸐。聲似鐘磐笙竽。世語曰：靑鸐鳴，時太平。又【廣韻】【集韻】?直角切，音濁。義同。本作翟。俗加鳥。

鸐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鸐字的起名意思

暂无。

Ray
Basic explanation of words
Ray
dí
〔Pheasant (
zh?)] Mountain pheasant, pheasant.
Ray
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dí］
["Guangyun" cut at right angles, enter the senses, and clear. ]
["Jiyun" Pavilion calendar cut, enter Xi, end. ]
(1) Long-tailed pheasant.
(2) The sub-regulation.
Ray
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸐; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1503 No. 32
[Jiyun] Pavilion calendar cut, sound flute. 【Erya·Shiniao】mu, mountain pheasant. [Guo's Note] Long-tailed ones. 【Sparse】Mountain pheasant, a pheasant. Nowadays, pheasant is called. Li Shizhen said: pheasants live in the wilderness and dinosaurs live in the mountains and forests, so they get the name of the mountain, and the bigger one is the owl. Also [The Year of the Prince·Supplementary Notes] Emperor Yao reigned. There were birds of good singing in the north of Yushan, with a human face and a beak, eight wings and one foot. The sound is like Zhong Pan Sheng Ling. The world language said: Tianming, time is peaceful. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cut at right angles, voice turbid. The same meaning. This is Di. Common plus bird.
Ray
